import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" function App() { const [msg,setmsg] = useState("") const [status,setstatus] = useState(false) function handlemsg(event) { setmsg(event.target.value) } function send() { setstatus axios.post("http://localhost:5000/sendemail",{msg:msg}) } return (
